svg.text: // dense indented rail, expand/collapse affordance, inline metrics
[Enter] attach [m] messages [p] poll [x] move variant [d] delete
d0: product (1) d1: variants (3) d2: actors (3) d3: sub-agents (8)
Accordion rail: expand/collapse per node | Detail panel: focused node full info | Inline metrics: summary without expanding | Depth-aware collapse shortcuts
